formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'QUEUE_VARIABLES' =-
[Syntax] QUEUE_VARIABLES(<queuename>)
[Synopsis] Return Queue information in variables
[Description] Makes the following queue variables available. QUEUEMAX maxmimum number of calls allowed QUEUESTRATEGY the strategy of the queue QUEUECALLS number of calls currently in the queue QUEUEHOLDTIME current average hold time QUEUECOMPLETED number of completed calls for the queue QUEUEABANDONED number of abandoned calls QUEUESRVLEVEL queue service level QUEUESRVLEVELPERF current service level performance Returns 0 if queue is found and setqueuevar is defined, -1 otherwise

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:
